name: Keibajou he Gyoukou! Wide
summary: Recommended for horse racing beginners and young couples who go to the racetrack like a date! A tool that allows you to easily predict horse racing simply by entering the winning odds. If you anticipate the newly introduced wide betting ticket, the hit rate will increase further. No detailed information input. The only data required for forecasting is the winning odds displayed in newspapers and racetracks. If there is a horse that is pushed or you want to exclude from the forecast among the racehorses, you can set the evaluation and reflect it in the forecast. You can select the purchase tendency of betting tickets from the four patterns of "Random", "Solid favorite", "Aim for holes", and "Aim for large holes", and the expected results will change accordingly. Of course, it comes with a convenient help function that explains horse racing terms.
